title: Can we use ‘Dear journal’ while writing in a journal? - Quora

response.answer_text: You can use whatever you want, to address your journal. It's yours and only you would be reading it, so use whatever comes into your mind. As for me, I don't address my journal. I start with the date and then it's mostly me talking to myself in the content. Best part? You can be as creative as you want (for example- addressing it with a name, just a crazy suggestion) since you'd be the only one to read it.

Why not? It is your own journal and you needn’t restrict yourself in any way while writing in it. Give yourself the freedom to write whatever you think best in your journal. A journal loosens you up and helps you express things. You can share things with your journal that you wouldn’t share elsewhere. Keep writing! Archana Sarat
